title: IFrame.KeepInvisible
description: Gets or sets whether to keep the SOLIDWORKS frame invisible.
returns: True to keep the SOLIDWORKS frame invisible, false to keep it visible
remarks:
Use this property when SOLIDWORKS is
invisible
and you want to
activate
a component and prevent SOLIDWORKS from becoming visible. Be sure to set this property back to false after the operation for which you set it to true completes.

examples.title: Keep SOLIDWORKS Invisible While Activating Documents (C#)
Keep SOLIDWORKS Invisible While Activating Documents (VB.NET)
